00032 namespace loos {
00033 
00035 
00036   class AmberRst : public Trajectory {
00037   public:
00038     explicit AmberRst(const std::string& s, const int na) : Trajectory(s), _natoms(na),
00039                                                             frame_offset(0), frame_size(0), current_time(0.0),
00040                                                             periodic(false), seek_flag(false) {
00041 
00042       parseFrame();
00043       cached_first = true;
00044     }
00045 
00046 
00047 
00048     explicit AmberRst(const char* p, const int na) : Trajectory(p), _natoms(na),
00049                                                      frame_offset(0), frame_size(0), current_time(0.0),
00050                                                      periodic(false), seek_flag(false) {
00051       parseFrame();
00052       cached_first = true;
00053     }
00054 
00055 
00056     virtual void rewindImpl(void) { seek_flag = false; cached_first = true; }
00057     virtual uint nframes(void) const { return(1); }
00058     virtual uint natoms(void) const { return(_natoms); }
00059     virtual std::vector<GCoord> coords(void) { return(frame); }
00060     virtual void updateGroupCoords(AtomicGroup&);
00061 
00062     virtual void seekNextFrameImpl(void);
00063     virtual void seekFrameImpl(const uint);
00064     virtual bool parseFrame(void);
00065 
00066     virtual bool hasPeriodicBox(void) const { return(periodic); }
00067     virtual GCoord periodicBox(void) const { return(box); }
00068 
00069     virtual float timestep(void) const { return(0.0); }  // Dummy routine...
00070     greal currentTime(void) const { return(current_time); }
00071     
00072 
00073   private:
00074     uint _natoms, _nframes;
00075     unsigned long frame_offset, frame_size;
00076     greal current_time;
00077     bool periodic;
00078     GCoord box;
00079     std::vector<GCoord> frame;
00080 
00081     bool seek_flag;
00082   };

00085 }
